meanings.definition: A card for sending a message by mail without an envelope.
meanings.sent1: I sent my friend a postcard from my vacation.
meanings.sent2: My grandma collects postcards from all over the world.
meanings.sent3: The postcard had a funny picture of a dancing cat on it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a postcard, bright and full of joy.
meanings.sent5: The postcard of the sunset made me wish I was there.

meanings.definition: A photograph or picture printed on card stock for mailing.
meanings.sent1: I bought a beautiful postcard of the Eiffel Tower.
meanings.sent2: The postcard of the beach made me miss summer.
meanings.sent3: The postcard with the cute puppy made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a postcard, capturing the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent5: The postcard of the mountains took my breath away.
